mapper.insert: insert into member (mid, mname, mpassword, menabled, mrole, memail) values (#{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, 1, #{mrole}, #{memail})
mapper.update: update member set mname = #{mname}, mpassword = #{mpassword}, menabled = #{menabled}, mrole = #{mrole}, memail = #{memail} where mid = #{mid}
